atk-abh03a49:1_0: Idāni tesaññeva mūlayamake desitānaṁ kusalādidhammānaṁ labbhamānavasena ekadesaṁ
atk-abh03a49:1_1: saṁgaṇhitvā dhammayamakānantaraṁ desitassa indriyayamakassa vaṇṇanā hoti. Tattha
atk-abh03a49:1_2: khandhayamakādīsu vuttanayeneva pāḷivavatthānaṁ veditabbaṁ. Idhāpi hi paṇṇattivārādayo
atk-abh03a49:1_3: tayo mahāvārā avasesā antaravārā ca saddhiṁ kālappabhedādīhi khandhayamakādīsu āgatasadisāva.
atk-abh03a49:1_4: Indriyānaṁ pana bahutāya dhātuyamakatopi bahutarāni yamakāni honti. Yathā pana heṭṭhā
atk-abh03a49:1_6: jivhāyatanakāyāyatanāni na yojitāni. Jivhāyatanakāyāyatanamūlakāni ca yamakāneva
atk-abh03a49:1_7: na gahitāni, tathā idhāpi cakkhundriyamūlake naye jivhindriyakāyindriyāni na yojitāni,
atk-abh03a49:1_8: jivhindriyakāyindriyamūlakāni ca yamakāneva na gahitāni. Tesaṁ aggahaṇe kāraṇaṁ tattha
atk-abh03a49:1_9: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ. Manindriyaṁ pana yathā cakkhundriyādimūlakehi tatheva itthindriyādimūlakehipi
atk-abh03a49:1_10: saddhiṁ yasmā yojanaṁ gacchati, tasmā nikkhittapaṭipāṭiyā ayojetvā sabbehipi cakkhundriyamūlakādīhi
atk-abh03a49:1_11: saddhiṁ pariyosāne yojitanti veditabbaṁ. Cakkhundriyena saddhiṁ itthindriyapurisindriyajīvitindriyāni
atk-abh03a49:1_12: yojitāni sukhindriyadukkhindriyadomanassindriyāni paṭisandhiyaṁ natthīti na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a49:1_13: Somanassindriyaupekkhindriyāni paṭisandhiyaṁ uppattisabbhāvato gahitāni. Tathā saddhindriyādīni
atk-abh03a49:1_14: pañca. Lokuttarāni tīṇi paṭisandhiyaṁ abhāveneva na gahitāni. Iti yāni gahitāni,
atk-abh03a49:1_15: tesaṁ vasenettha cakkhundriyamūlake naye yamakagaṇanā veditabbā. Yathā cettha, evaṁ
atk-abh03a49:1_16: sabbattha. Yāni pana na gahitāni, tesaṁ vasena yamakāni na gaṇetabbāni. Gaṇentena
atk-abh03a49:1_17: vā moghapucchāvasena gaṇetabbānīti evaṁ tāva sabbavāresu pāḷivavatthānameva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:3_0: 1-86. Atthavinicchaye panettha idaṁ nayamukhaṁ – sacakkhukānaṁ na itthīnanti brahmapārisajjādīnañceva
atk-abh03a49:3_1: rūpīnaṁ purisanapuṁsakānañca vasena vuttaṁ. Tesañhi itthindriyaṁ nuppajjati. Sacakkhukānaṁ
atk-abh03a49:3_2: na purisānanti rūpībrahmānañceva itthinapuṁsakānañca vasena vuttaṁ. Tesañhi purisindriyaṁ
atk-abh03a49:3_3: nuppajjati. Acakkhukānaṁ upapajjantānaṁ tesaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ uppajjatīti ekavokāracatuvokārakāmadhātusatte
atk-abh03a49:3_4: sandhāya vuttaṁ. Sacakkhukānaṁ vinā somanassenāti upekkhāsahagatānaṁ catunnaṁ mahāvipākapaṭisandhīnaṁ
atk-abh03a49:3_5: vasena vuttaṁ. Sacakkhukānaṁ vinā upekkhāyāti somanassasahagatapaṭisandhikānaṁ vasena
atk-abh03a49:3_6: vuttaṁ. Upekkhāya acakkhukānanti ahetukapaṭisandhivasena vuttaṁ. Ahetukānanti ahetukapaṭisandhicittena
atk-abh03a49:3_7: saddhiṁ saddhindriyādīnaṁ abhāvato vuttaṁ. Tattha hi ekanteneva saddhāsatipaññāyo
atk-abh03a49:3_8: natthi. Samādhivīriyāni pana indriyappattāni na honti. Sahetukānaṁ acakkhukānanti
atk-abh03a49:3_9: gabbhaseyyakavasena ceva arūpīvasena ca vuttaṁ. Añño hi sahetuko acakkhuko nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a49:3_10: Sacakkhukānaṁ ahetukānanti apāye opapātikavasena vuttaṁ. Sacakkhukānaṁ ñāṇavippayuttānanti
atk-abh03a49:3_11: kāmadhātuyaṁ duhetukapaṭisandhikānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ. Sacakkhukānaṁ ñāṇasampayuttānanti
atk-abh03a49:3_12: rūpībrahmāno ceva kāmāvacaradevamanusse ca sandhāya vuttaṁ. Ñāṇasampayuttānaṁ acakkhukānanti
atk-abh03a49:3_13: arūpino ca tihetukagabbhaseyyake ca sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a49:4_0: 190. Jīvitindriyamūlake vinā somanassena upapajjantānanti dvepi jīvitindriyāni sandhāya
atk-abh03a49:4_2: vuttaṁ. Iminā nayena sabbatthāpi paṭisandhipavattivasena jīvitindriyayojanā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a49:4_4: pana nirodhavāre ca etesañceva aññesañca dhammānaṁ yathālābhavasena cutipaṭisandhipavattesu
atk-abh03a49:5_0: 281. Anāgatavāre eteneva bhāvenāti etena purisabhāveneva, antarā itthibhāvaṁ anāpajjitvā
atk-abh03a49:5_1: purisapaṭisandhiggahaṇenevāti attho. Katici bhave dassetvā parinibbāyissantīti katici
atk-abh03a49:5_2: paṭisandhiyo gahetvā itthibhāvaṁ appatvāva parinibbāyissantīti attho. Dutiyapucchāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a49:6_0: 361. Paccuppannena atītavāre suddhāvāsānaṁ upapatticittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe manindriyañca
atk-abh03a49:6_1: nuppajjitthāti cittayamake viya uppādakkhaṇātikkamavasena atthaṁ aggahetvā tasmiṁ
atk-abh03a49:6_2: bhave anuppannapubbavasena gahetabboti. Iminā nayamukhena sabbasmimpi pavattivāre
atk-abh03a49:9_0: 435-482. Pariññāvāre pana cakkhumūlakādīsu ekameva cakkhusotayamakaṁ dassitaṁ. Yasmā
atk-abh03a49:9_1: pana sesānipi lokiyaabyākatāni ceva lokiyaabyākatamissakāni ca pariññeyyāneva, tasmā
atk-abh03a49:9_2: tāni anupadiṭṭhānipi imināva dassitāni honti. Yasmā pana akusalaṁ ekantato pahātabbameva,
atk-abh03a49:9_3: ekantaṁ kusalaṁ bhāvetabbameva, lokuttarābyākataṁ sacchikātabbaṁ, tasmā “domanassindriyaṁ
atk-abh03a49:9_5: vuttaṁ. Aññindriyaṁ pana bhāvetabbampi atthi sacchikātabbampi, taṁ bhāvanāvaseneva
atk-abh03a49:9_6: gahitaṁ. Tattha dve puggalāti sakadāgāmimaggasamaṅgī ca, arahattamaggasamaṅgī ca.
atk-abh03a49:9_7: Tesu eko samucchindituṁ asamatthattā domanassindriyaṁ na pajahati nāma. Eko pahīnadosattā
atk-abh03a49:9_8: cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti anuppādaṁ āpādetuṁ asamatthatāya na parijānāti. Iminā
atk-abh03a49:17: Yamakaṁ nāma pakāsitaṁ, yamāmalalomena yaṁ tena.
atk-abh03a49:22: Niṭṭhaṁ pattā evaṁ, niṭṭhānaṁ pāpuṇantu sabbepi;
